Description: Actual departure time (format HHMM or HMM), local time zone.
Actual arrival time (format HHMM or HMM), local time zone.
Scheduled departure time (format HHMM or HMM), local time zone.
Scheduled arrival time (format HHMM or HMM), local time zone.
Departure delay, in minutes. Negative times represent early departures.
Arrival delay, in minutes. Negative times represent early arrivals.
Amount of time spent in the air, in minutes.
Scheduled date and hour of the flight as a POSIXct date.
